item.title: Start the trolling
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:95, topic:270422”]How does my presence on MoparScape, having most of my posts in the help sections (and may I add that the majority of those posts are of me helping) prove that I am a moron? Let it be known that I’m older than you, in college, and actually am going somewhere in my life.[/quote]Need I remind you, the General Discussion board is a very popular one indeed. It’s very respectable; you, however, are not respectable. You’re even less respectable than me. I can’t even conceive such a thing.

[quote=“Unhandled, post:96, topic:270422”][quote author=Adam link=topic=356887.msg3046814#msg3046814 date=1259797451]
How does my presence on MoparScape, having most of my posts in the help sections (and may I add that the majority of those posts are of me helping) prove that I am a moron? Let it be known that I’m older than you, in college, and actually am going somewhere in my life.
[/quote]
It proves you are a massive fucking hypocrite for saying the majority of his posts aren’t in any “respectable boards”. No, helping 11 yearolds with their moparscape severs isn’t considered respectable. Nobody gives a flying fuck how old you are, and you only furthered my belief that you are in fact a total moron by feeling the need to add that to your reply.[/quote]holy shit
